results.description: Manx archer Lesley Sleight reflects on a successful year that has yielded World and European titles as well as world records.
results.shortTitle: Archer Sleight enjoys her best season yet
results.title: Lesley Sleight: Isle of Man archer enjoys best season yet in 2019

results.description: Alice Schlesinger wins judo silver for Great Britain at the European Games in Minsk, while Naomi Folkard and Patrick Huston secure silver in archery.
results.title: European Games: Alice Schlesinger wins judo silver for Great Britain

results.description: Great Britain win European Games gold in archery a day after the sport was left out of the 2022 Commonwealth Games programme.
results.shortTitle: GB win European Games archery gold
results.title: European Games: Great Britain win archery gold following Birmingham 2022 omission

results.description: Sally Conway is named Great Britain's flag bearer as the second European Games get under way in Minsk, Belarus.
results.shortTitle: Second European Games begin in Minsk
results.title: Sally Conway named Great Britain flag bearer as European Games begin in Minsk

results.description: Great Britain's women's recurve team beat China to win bronze at the World Championships in the Netherlands.
results.shortTitle: Britain beat China to win World bronze
results.title: World Championships: British women recurvers beat China to win bronze

thumbnail.altText: Bryony Pitman of Great Britain during the women's recurve team finals at the 2019 World Archery Championships in the Netherlands

results.description: Great Britain's men's and women's teams qualify the full quota of three places for the 2020 Tokyo Olympics by making the quarter-finals of the World Championships.
results.shortTitle: GB archery teams qualify for Tokyo 2020
results.title: Men's and women's archery teams qualify Great Britain for Tokyo 2020

results.description: Live coverage of the 2019 World Archery Championships in 's-Hertogenbosch.
results.title: Watch: World Archery Championships - Recurve team & individual medal matches

results.description: Live coverage of the 2019 World Archery Championships in 's-Hertogenbosch.
results.title: Catch-up: World Archery Championships

results.description: Paralympic champion Jessica Stretton wins silver at the World Para-archery Championships, hours after winning team silver with Phoebe Pine and Jodie Grinham.
results.title: World Para-archery Championships: Jessica Stretton wins two silver medals in the Netherlands

results.description: Great Britain's archers have secured five quota places for next year's Tokyo Paralympics at the World Para-archery Championships in the Netherlands.
results.shortTitle: GB archers secure Tokyo quota places
results.title: World Para-archery Championships: GB secure five quota places for Tokyo 2020 Paralympics

results.description: Great Britain's Patrick Huston says that the archery team are in a "fantastic place" as they step up their bid for a place at the 2020 Olympics.
results.shortTitle: Huston takes aim for place at Olympics
results.title: Tokyo 2020: Patrick Huston takes aim for place at Olympics

results.description: Jason Kenny heads a 101-strong GB squad for the second edition of the European Games in Minsk, Belarus which will be held in June.
results.shortTitle: Kenny heads GB European Games squad
results.title: European Games: Jason Kenny named in 101-strong GB squad

results.description: Traditional Bhutanese archery is still for men only, but Dorji Dema plans to put this right.
results.shortTitle: A female archer taking aim at sexism
results.title: Dorji Dema: A female archer taking aim at sexism

thumbnail.altText: Dorji Dema training for the Beijing Olympics

results.description: Cameron Radigan on his campaign to have his leg amputated and his archery dream.
results.shortTitle: 'The nervous bit was saying I didn't want my leg anymore'
results.title: Cameron Radigan opens up on his passion for archery

results.description: Fourteen Olympic and Paralympic sports receive investment from the new 3m Aspiration Fund to help support their ambitions for Tokyo 2020.
results.shortTitle: Fourteen sports to get funding boost
results.title: Tokyo 2020: Fourteen sports to get funding boost from Aspiration Fund

results.description: Four Olympic sports and one Paralympic sport will receive no funding from UK Sport for the 2020 Games in Tokyo.
results.title: Tokyo 2020: Four Olympic sports and one Paralympic sport lose funding

results.description: UK Sport has launched a 3m Aspiration Fund with the aim of helping more athletes compete at the Tokyo
results.title: Tokyo 2020: UK Sport offers new investment for unfunded Olympic and Paralympic sports

results.description: Watch live streaming of the European Archery Championships in Poland, with Great Britain going for gold in the men's compound.

results.title: Archery: GB men's team shooting for gold at Europeans

results.description: The European Archery Championships take place in Legnica, Poland - watch BBC Sport coverage of finals day on Red Button, online & connected TVs.
